text: Fluvitrygon is a genus of stingrays in the family Dasyatidae from freshwater in southeast Asia. Its species were formerly contained within the genus Himantura. ==Species== * Fluvitrygon kittipongi (Vidthayanon & Roberts, 2006) (Roughback whipray) * Fluvitrygon oxyrhyncha (Sauvage, 1878) (Marbled whipray) * Fluvitrygon signifer (Compagno & Roberts, 1982) (White-edge freshwater whipray) ==References== Category:Dasyatidae cATEGORY:Freshwater fish genera
title: Fluvitrygon
